api_list.name: Get QRCode
api_list.description: It will send you a QRCode with desired color and size.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qrcode-png-color.p.rapidapi.com/qrcode"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qrcode-png-color.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Simple QRCode
api_list.description: This will give you a simple QRCode from text.
